thread.title: Romelu Lukaku will sign new Everton deal, says Mino Raiola
thread.title_full: Romelu Lukaku will sign new Everton deal, says Mino Raiola | Daily Mail Online

author: Tom Bassam For Mailonline
title: Romelu Lukaku will sign new Everton deal, says Mino Raiola
text:
Romelu Lukaku's agent Mino Raiola has insisted his client will sign a new deal at Everton, with talks currently ongoing.
Lukaku's long-term future at Goodison Park has been the topic of debate in recent months after another summer and January window where his name was consistently linked with Europe's top clubs.
After his four-goal show against Bournemouth last weekend, Everton are ever keener to tie Lukaku down. Now, according to super agent Raiola, a deal is close.
Romelu Lukaku's agent Mino Raiola has confirmed his client will sign a new deal at Everton
Raiola, Lukaku's agent, has revealed that a summer deal is close for the Toffees star striker
Speaking to talkSPORT , Raiola said: 'There are no problems right now between the player and the club.
'Talks are ongoing. He will sign.'
Despite this development Everton manager Ronald Koeman admitted back in December that even if Lukaku signs a new contract it would not guarantee his future at the club.
Ronald Koeman previously admitted even a new contract would not guarantee Lukaku's future
ROMELU LUKAKU 2016-17 SEASON Games: 25
Goals: 17
Assists: 5
Minutes per goal: 129
The Dutchman said at the time: 'It is a big deal. The club need to keep their best players and do everything to keep them in the club because that is the future.
'Of course you don't know in football what can happen in one year but at least there is an understanding that the boy likes to stay and he is a big part of Everton's future.
'Even when they sign new contracts, they don't say they will stay until the end of the contract. It is football and business.'
